index.name: backbone
index.subtitle: Backbone
index.about: Backbone.js gives structure to web applications by providing models with key-value binding and custom events, collections with a rich API of enumerable functions, views with declarative event handling, and connects it all to your existing API over a RESTful JSON interface.
index.description: Watch screencasts over a list with the best free videos about Backbone framework.

videos.title: Backbone Tutorial 1 - Introduction/Setup
videos.description: This video will help you understand the main concepts about Backbone framework and how to setup it in your project.

videos.title: Backbone Tutorial 2 - Model
videos.description: This video will explain about Backbone models.

videos.title: Backbone Tutorial 3 - View
videos.description: This video will explain about Backbone views.

videos.title: Backbone Tutorial 4 - Router
videos.description: This video will explain about Backbone routers.

videos.title: Backbone Tutorial 5 - Collections
videos.description: This video will explain about Backbone collections.

videos.title: Backbone Tutorial - Create Simple app Part 1
videos.description: This video will explain how to create a simple application using Backbone.

videos.title: Backbone Tutorial - Create Simple app Part 2
videos.description: This video is the last part about how to create a simple application using Backbone.

videos.title: Building Dialogs with Custom Regions
videos.description: In this screencast we'll go through integrating a jQuery UI dialog into our Backbone application. You'll see how to create a custom region object with Marionette to serve as a specialized dialog.

videos.title: Loading Views
videos.description: In this screencast, we'll build a fully functioning loading component using Backbone.js and Marionette.js. We'll answer how to handle old views when new views are requested.

videos.title: Hands-on Backbone.js
videos.description: Get up to speed with Backbone to create rich, interactive applications in a browser.
